Machine_Summary: Hotel paradisus on the French island of Reunion in the South Pacific is one of the most expensive hotels in the world, with a price tag of more than $1.5m (Â£1.2m) for a three-day package.
Human_Summary: enjoyed my stay despite initial misgivings about haiti situation. rainy day aside, staff was friendly and room was kept quite nicely. the restaurant served good coffee, the large pool was clean, and meals included decent wine beverages.

Machine_Summary: The marqueen lake union hotel in Seattle, Washington, is one of the best hotels in the US for weddings, and the reviews are overwhelmingly positive, with more than 1,000 reviews on TripAdvisor, Yelp, and Trip Advisor.
Human_Summary: perfect hotel for my wedding. husband chose it in july. excellent rates, room, and amenities. rooms were like small apartments with small kitchenette built dining space with great architecture. wedding organization service was excellent.

Machine_Summary: Ritz-Carlton St. Regis Aspen was a good value for money, but not as good as some of the other resorts I've been to in the US, so here's a round-up of the good, the bad and the ugly.
Human_Summary: great service and nice pool but ok beach and small room. there was no line for checkin but heard engine thrusts and plane engines. good for young families with babies as service club provided great personal concierge.

Machine_Summary: Ritz-Carlton, Palm Beach, Florida, 5 stars out of 5 on a scale of 1-10 with 10 being the best, best value for money, most expensive hotel in the US, best view of the ocean, best views of the world.
Human_Summary: great for kids due to the excellent supervision and entertainment available for them. lots of sea activities too like sailing and swimming with fish. cleaning staff were thorough. hotel restaurant was excellent but there was also a denny’s.

Machine_Summary: A review of a five-star hotel in Bali, Indonesia, by a mother and her three children, all saying it was worth the money and effort to stay there, despite the fact it cost more than 5 times their normal Bali price.
Human_Summary: my stay was heaven. spent a wonderful 11 nights with my husband and 3 kids. staff was very impressive, especially the courteous repairmen. however, some of the services were a bit pricy. rooms and beds were massive
